---
id: totp-validation
title: "TOTP validation"
description: "The API verifies a Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) for two-factor authentication (2FA). Once verified, it issues an authentication token, allowing the user to access protected resources."
sidebar_label: "TOTP validation"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"TOTP validation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/totp-validate"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API verifies a Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) for two-factor authentication (2FA). Once verified, it issues an authentication token, allowing the user to access protected resources.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}

          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>

        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >

          name={"data"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}

          schema={{"type":"string","default":"","description":"The encrypted login information that securely represents the user's credentials for authentication."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
